title: Gilmore Girls Relationships
description: Test your knowledge of the romances and friendships!

questions.question: Who is Rory's first boyfriend in the series?
questions.explanation: Dean Forester is Rory's first boyfriend, a tall new kid in town who falls for her at school.

questions.question: Luke and Lorelai eventually get together.
questions.explanation: After years of will-they-won't-they tension, Luke and Lorelai finally become a couple.

questions.question: Who does Sookie marry?
questions.explanation: Sookie marries Jackson Belleville, the local produce supplier who grows vegetables for the inn.

questions.question: Who is the wealthy Yale student Rory dates?
questions.explanation: Logan Huntzberger is a wealthy, charming Yale student and member of the Life and Death Brigade.

questions.question: Who is Rory's father?
questions.explanation: Christopher Hayden is Rory's father, Lorelai's high school boyfriend who was absent for much of Rory's life.

questions.question: Lane Kim marries Zack Van Gerbig.
questions.explanation: Lane marries Zack, her bandmate from Hep Alien, and they have twin boys.

questions.question: Which teacher did Lorelai briefly get engaged to?
questions.explanation: Max Medina, Rory's English teacher at Chilton, proposes to Lorelai but they don't go through with the wedding.

questions.question: What is Lorelai's relationship with her mother Emily like?
questions.explanation: Lorelai and Emily have a complicated relationship due to Lorelai leaving home at 16 and their very different values.
